response.overview: The creators of Boondoggle bring you Flow Trash. This full length feature by Tim Fulton, Philip Schwartz, and Pete Spooner will include full parts from Twin Cities skateboarders Davis Torgerson, David Jaimes, Dan Narloch, CJ Tambornino, Ian Sherman, Casey Copenhaver, Dominic Rondazzo, David Nelson, and maybe even more... Enjoy, sit back, and wait for the DVD to come out just in time for your parents to buy it for you as the best holiday gift ever!
response.title: Flow Trash
